channel.title: math.KT updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: math.KT updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: On solvability of the first Hochschild cohomology of odd p-groups
item.description: arXiv:2512.14555v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: We give a necessary and sufficient criterion for the solvability of $\operatorname{HH}^1(kP)$ as a Lie algebra, where $P$ is a $p$-group with $p$ odd, in terms of a directed graph constructed from the group $P$. This gives non-trivial results on the structure of such Lie algebras.
item.dc:creator: Matthew Antrobus

item.title: Higher Lefschetz formulas on {\Gamma}-proper manifolds
item.description: arXiv:2512.14318v1 Announce Type: cross Abstract: Let $\Gamma$ be a finitely generated discrete group acting properly and cocompactly on a smooth manifold M. By employing heat-kernel techniques we prove a geometric formula for the pairing of the index class associated to a $\Gamma$-equivariant Dirac operator $D$ with a delocalized cyclic cocycles $\tau$ in $HP^\bullet (\mathbb{C}\Gamma,\langle \gamma \rangle)$. Our formula takes place on the fixed point manifold $M^\gamma$ and should be regarded as a higher Lefschetz formula for $D$. The formula involves the Atiyah-Segal-Singer form and an explicit $Z_\gamma$-invariant form on $M^\gamma$ that is naturally associated to $\tau\in HP^\bullet (\mathbb{C}\Gamma,\langle \gamma \rangle)$
item.dc:creator: Paolo Piazza, Hessel Posthuma, Yanli Song, Xiang Tang
